definition: to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters

sentences.english: This new sort of punch could stamp out 3,000 bonnets an hour.
sentences.chinese: 這種新型衝牀每小時可衝壓出三千個汽車引擎蓋。

sentences.english: Under the transparent bonnet there are two extra lights helping the user to travel through the desert during night.
sentences.chinese: 半透明引擎蓋下方是車燈以便夜路旅行。

sentences.english: The sign stood alone on the hood of the little white Saturn coupe.
sentences.chinese: 標牌樹立在那輛白色汽車的引擎蓋上。

sentences.english: And with a plush bodysuit and adorable hood, there's every reason to cheer.
sentences.chinese: 毛絨合同衫和可愛的引擎蓋，完全有理由歡呼。

sentences.english: The arched bonnet speaks volumes about the V10 high-rev engine.
sentences.chinese: 那弧形的引擎蓋暗示着其內部的V10高速引擎。

sentences.english: With no time to dive out of the way, he leaped upward and sailed over the car’s hood.
sentences.chinese: 來不及躲閃的羅尼猛地一躍，跳至道奇車的引擎蓋上。

sentences.english: Split the upper part of the hood using as reference the top view.
sentences.chinese: 斯普利特上部引擎蓋借鑑頂端的看法。

sentences.english: Take the seat sling and place the hood over the frame crown.
sentences.chinese: 以座位吊索和地點框架冠在引擎蓋。

sentences.english: and a portrait of Jackson as Peter Pan painted on the bonnet of an electric cart
sentences.chinese: 一輛汽車引擎蓋上繪製的傑克遜彼得潘形象。

sentences.english: Should I look under the hood?
sentences.chinese: 要不要我看看引擎蓋下面？

sentences.english: Nothing special under the hood for the show cars is known.
sentences.chinese: 引擎蓋下面沒有什麼特別的。

sentences.english: The bullets ricocheted off the bonnet and windscreen.
sentences.chinese: 子彈從汽車引擎蓋和擋風玻璃上彈飛了。
